about.title: About me
about.text: I am a Systems Analysis and Development (ADS) student at Fatec Carapicuíba, passionate about technology and programming. I am constantly seeking new challenges that allow me to learn, grow, and contribute to innovative solutions. I have experience in front-end and back-end development, as well as knowledge of modern DevOps practices. Currently, I am delving into the field of Machine Learning (ML), with an understanding of its functioning, including model creation and training, and familiarity with widely used tools and libraries in the area. I value teamwork and am always ready to bring my skills to challenging projects.

responsibilities.title: Atividade desempenhada
responsibilities.description: I worked as support for my department, with the following responsibilities:
tasks: Manage and analyze user feedback on the FAQ page, identifying key points and suggesting improvements.
Perform data analysis related to the FAQ to understand performance and identify improvement opportunities.
Create a weekly banner highlighting the best compliment received from users, as a recognition for employees.
Provide support for other tasks as needed, ensuring smooth operations.

course.name: Prompt Engineering on AWS with Claude
Advanced Image and Text Analysis with AI on AWS

list.title: Front End
list.description: Experience in creating responsive and dynamic user interfaces, using best practices and modern frameworks.

list.title: Dev Ops
list.description: Knowledge in automating environments and version control to ensure agile and integrated workflows.

list.title: Machine Learning
list.description: Experience in applying machine learning techniques and tools. Skilled in leveraging AI Generative capabilities, prompt engineering, and utilizing platforms like AWS SageMaker Canvas for model integration. Hands-on experience with practical projects including facial recognition, recommendation systems, and virtual assistants, along with expertise in Python and data extraction.

skills.note: Although I have experience with the mentioned technologies, I am a beginner in the field and recognize that there is always more to learn. I am continuously improving my skills and staying updated with the latest trends and best practices in the industry.

projects.name: Grandes Mentes
projects.description: This project uses the 'Pensador' API to display reflective and inspirational quotes from four famous philosophers.

contactMe.title: Get in Touch
contactMe.message: I’m always open to connecting! Whether you have a question, want to share ideas, or just say hello, my inbox is ready for you. Additionally, if you'd like to discuss job opportunities or tech-related projects, I’d be glad to hear from you. Feel free to drop me a message, and I’ll reply as soon as I can!
